mapper.select: select score.classNO, score.memberNO, memberName, memberEmail, memberPhoneNO, className from score join member on score.memberNO = member.memberNO join class on class.classNO = score.classNO where score.classNO = #{classNO}
mapper.update: MERGE INTO score s USING DUAL ON (s.CLASSNO = #{classNO} AND s.MEMBERNO = #{memberNO}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET s.MIDTERMSCORE = #{midtermScore}, s.FINALSSCORE=#{finalsScore}, s.assignmentScore= #{assignmentScore}, s.attendanceScore= #{attendanceScore}, s.GRADE= #{grade} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT(classNO, memberNO, midtermScore,finalsScore,assignmentScore, attendanceScore, grade) VALUES (#{classNO} , #{memberNO} , #{midtermScore}, #{finalsScore}, #{assignmentScore}, #{attendanceScore}, #{grade} )
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(midtermScore,'0') AS midtermScore, NVL(finalsScore,'0') AS finalsScore, NVL(assignmentScore,'0') AS assignmentScore, NVL(attendanceScore,'0') AS attendanceScore, NVL(grade,'-') AS grade FROM score WHERE classNO=#{classNO} AND memberNO= #{studentNO}
